alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 18 at 1:36PM MST until June 19 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON MDT/ TO 7 PM MST /8 PM MDT/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts from 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...All of northern Arizona from the White Mountains, Mogollon Rim and Yavapai County Mountains north to the Utah border. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST /noon MDT/ to 7 PM MST /8 PM MDT/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Patchy blowing dust may develop over lower elevations of northeast Arizona.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
